qas.question: Images of what item were posted by Eon while the movie was being made?

On which social media accounts was the film promoted?
What other Bond film was promoted on social media?

context: To <b7_0>promote the film<b7_0/>, <b4_0><b5_0>production<b5_0/><b4_0/> continued the trend established during <a1_0><a3_0>Skyfall<a3_0/><a1_0/>'s production of releasing still images of <a0_0>clapperboards<a0_0/> and video blogs on <a2_0><b6_0>Eon's<b6_0/> official social media accounts.
